product_name: CliniqueClinique For Men Charcoal Face Wash
summary: SummaryClinique For Men Charcoal Face Wash is a detoxifying gel wash that delivers a deep-pore clean.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Soothing, non-drying lather gently foams away impurities.Natural charcoal draws out dirt and excess oil that can clog pores.Leaves all skin types feeling fresh, comfortable.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2290943How To UseUse twice a day, morning and night. Lather between palms with tepid water. Massage all over damp skin to remove dirt and oil, and soften beard. Rinse well and towel dry. Mornings, shave as usual.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Coco-Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Sarcosinate, Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Caffeine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Monosodium Citrate, Butylene Glycol, Citric Acid, Charcoal Powder, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (CI 77499).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use twice a day, morning and night. Lather between palms with tepid water. Massage all over damp skin to remove dirt and oil, and soften beard. Rinse well and towel dry. Mornings, shave as usual.

reviews.headline: Husband love it
reviews.comments: My husband is bald so this balances his head and face. No breakouts. No shine. Just a good clean. He does need a light moisturizer on his face after. It does leave him tight without it but he likes a moisturizer anyway.

reviews.headline: Not a Huge a Help for Oil
reviews.comments: I bought this product because I had seen where other women with oily skin conditions had bought this and had success and I love charcoal based products. I didn't have much luck with this. I wash my face in the morning and evening and by the time to wash it again rolled around it was always extremely oily. I'm even starting to have acne breakouts again.

reviews.headline: Probably better for those who don't have oily skin
reviews.comments: It doesn't clean my face completely. Seems to leave it only somewhat clean. Will be returning it.

reviews.headline: Best face wash I can find
reviews.comments: I've tried dozens of cleansers and this is the one I keep coming back to. My face feels clean without being completely stripped when I use it. It's worth the price and more.

reviews.headline: Drying Facewash
reviews.comments: My husband, who has oily skin, said this made his skin so dry and tight. Very disappointed.

reviews.headline: Dramatic Improvement of Sebaceous Hyperplasia
reviews.comments: Started using this cleanser to help with my oily skin and sebaceous hyperplasia. I feel like my pore size is reduced and the sebaceous hyperplasia is considerably less noticeable. This does not dry out my skin at all.  I definitely recommend for anyone with oily skin.

reviews.headline: Awesome product!!!!
reviews.comments: Great product that I rub on my face to get rid of oils and dirt....plus clear out my pours in my face. Feels great when I apply the eye cream anti fatigue with SPF15 and the anti age facial cream. Highly recommend all of them to be honest

reviews.headline: Favorite face wash
reviews.comments: Really love this face wash and a little goes a long way. Doesn't feel harsh and doesn't dry up my face like some cheaper options do. A must have for my everyday routine

reviews.headline: I wanted to love it
reviews.comments:
I really wanted to love this cleanser. It lathers so well and feels AMAZING when you're rubbing it on your skin. But that's where the good things end :(
My skin is so itchy, tight, and dry now, when it's normally oily. I think I'd rather my skin produce enough oil to run a restaurant where everything is deep fried than feel this tightness.

reviews.headline: Clinique men's charcoal
reviews.comments: My husband specifically asked me to order this product for him, after he tried a sample size and felt it was a good cleanser. He has never asked me to buy anything similar like that before so he really felt it provided a good through pore cleansing.

reviews.headline: Contains a terrible allergen!
reviews.comments: Clinique claims this item is "allergy tested."  If so, they are not telling you that it failed the test.  The product is full of Methylisothiazolinone (and a second related compound.)  These substances were declared the 2013 Contact Allergen of the Year by the American Contact Dermatitis Society.  Clinique -- shame on you for putting one of the worst known allergens in a product you claim is 'allergy tested!"

reviews.headline: Would not want to be without it!
reviews.comments: use it every morning in the shower

reviews.headline: The War Against Whiteheads Is Won
reviews.comments: Yes, I know this was meant for men, but I received it as a sample and fell in love with the product. I am light-fair skin that easily gets blotchy and breakouts. After a full day of wearing wakeup, this product cleans and my face feels refreshed. I have combination skin, so it doesn't dry my skin out or leave an abundance of oil. I obtain whiteheads easily, but with this product, it helps make them go away and stay away. All it takes is this product and a face cloth, so it's extremely easy to use and keep up with maintaining a clean face. Additionally, I liked that this is a charcoal product that doesn't leave a â€‹leftover charcoal residue.

reviews.headline: I love this product and use it every day
reviews.comments: I use this product in the am and pm to remove makeup and oil. It's wonderful. It's gentle on my face and doesn't dry it out. I'm in my 50's and have trouble finding skin care that cleans my oily skin without drying it out. I imagine it would work well for all skin types.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I have tried so many various face washes. They either didn't clean enough or left my face and hands dry. This is the first face wash I can actually feel working! You don't need much at all of it either which is awsome!! I've had it for 3 days and I can feel a difference, even hours upon hours after use. I highly recommend this!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: After using this to wash my face, it felt great

reviews.headline: made my brother care about skincare
reviews.comments: this past summer, i bought this on a whim for my 21-year-old brother, who's only skincare routine was salicylic acid on the occasional pimple. after a little bit of arm twisting, i showed him how to use it and dropped the subject. today he tells me that his bottle is almost empty, and he's been using the face wash almost every day! he says it gives a really refreshing feeling and makes his skin feel smoother. his skin type is normal, slightly oily in the summer.

reviews.headline: My husband loves it
reviews.comments: I tried to get my husband to try something else and he literally asked for this by name.  He doesn't even know the name of his deodorant or shampoo

reviews.headline: Perfect facial cleanser
reviews.comments: Easy to use and effective product. Great for shave bumps and occasional break outs.

reviews.headline: Life Saver
reviews.comments: I bought this because it was on sale once. Ever since then I've been using it and I have seen very few breakouts.

properties.name: Best Uses

values.label: Use twice daily for best results

display_values: Use twice daily for best results

properties.name: Pros

values.label: It cleans his face very well with out drying
Lite fragrance, removes oil and makeup, gentle

display_values: It cleans his face very well with out drying
Lite fragrance, removes oil and makeup, gentle

faceoff_positive.comments: I found out that this cleanser has the exact same ingredients as the women's city block purifying charcoal cleansing gel (but you get a little more in this bottle for a 50 cent difference), so my husband and I both use this cleanser. I can see a visible difference in the blackheads, especially on my nose. My pores appear much smaller and the number of blackheads are reduced. The cleanser itself is a black gel that foams into a white lather so it doesn't leave a stain on your washcloths. I highly recommend this.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great cleanser for women too

faceoff_negative.comments: Clinique claims this item is "allergy tested."  If so, they are not telling you that it failed the test.  The product is full of Methylisothiazolinone (and a second related compound.)  These substances were declared the 2013 Contact Allergen of the Year by the American Contact Dermatitis Society.  Clinique -- shame on you for putting one of the worst known allergens in a product you claim is 'allergy tested!"
faceoff_negative.headline: Contains a terrible allergen!

rollup.name: Clinique For Men Charcoal Face Wash
